critique: The document is an executive order issued by President George W. Bush in 2002. It revokes a previous order concerning the Taliban due to the altered situation in Afghanistan following the US military campaign. However, it also reinforces and expands sanctions against the Taliban and associated individuals in response to ongoing terrorist threats. The order broadens the definition of "the Taliban" and authorizes the Secretary of State to modify this definition further. It asserts executive power in matters of national security and foreign policy.
